item.title: Multiple mature trees dangerously hanging, 12th October
item.description:
Multiple trees on the pavements on park avenue, between Lightcliffe and Kingsley have been planted improperly and not being taken care of. They now hang over the pavement. This will likely cause damages in the future and it is dangerous. It's a shameful use of public money and disrespectful for all green initiatives the council try promoting. A good Gardner could probably put a pole and try to rebalance the trees. For similar reasons we lost multiple trees that fell down at the top of the street and never got planted back. We do want a green street. Please help.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Avenue, Palmers Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet
